mapper.select: SELECT yc_soildust.*,co.COUNTY_NAME,co.city_code,co.city_name,SUBSTR(yc_soildust.scccode,1,2) AS scc1,SUBSTR(yc_soildust.scccode,3,2) AS scc2, SUBSTR(yc_soildust.scccode,5,3) AS scc3,SUBSTR(yc_soildust.scccode,8,3) AS scc4 FROM yc_soildust LEFT JOIN ( SELECT county.COUNTY_ID,county.COUNTY_NAME,city.city_name,city.city_code FROM county LEFT JOIN city ON county.city_code=city.city_code ) co ON co.COUNTY_ID=yc_soildust.county_id where yc_soildust.sd_id = #{sdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into yc_soildust
sd_id,
scccode,
county_id,
sd_year,
sd_takemeasures,
sd_utype,
sd_soiltype,
sd_area,
soilindexpm25,
soilindexpm10,
surindex,
noindex,
pindex,
pm25_emission,
pm10_emission,
voc_emission,
nh3_emission,
so2_emission,
co_emission,
oc_emission,
bc_emission,
nox_emission,
pm25_max,
pm10_max,
voc_max,
nh3_max,
so2_max,
co_max,
oc_max,
bc_max,
nox_max,
scc_describe,
flag,
